tool_description: An API endpoint to easily access stats for MW and Warzone players and matches. Easily create responsive dashboards and scripts using this simple API.
name: Call of Duty
title: Call of Duty

api_list.name: Get Modern Warfare Player Matches
api_list.description: Gets recent Modern Warfare multiplayer matches (up to last 20) of requested player.

api_list.name: Get Modern Warfare Player Stats
api_list.description: Get stats for Modern Warfare career and multiplayer modes of requested player.

api_list.name: Get Warzone Player Matches
api_list.description: Gets recent Warzone matches (up to last 20) of requested player.

api_list.name: Get Warzone Player Stats
api_list.description: Get stats for Warzone modes of requested player.
